nodes.text: Sakiyan shadowsuits were a type of shadowsuit body glove used by members of the Sakiyan species. Unlike other shadowsuits, which were woven from artificial shadowsilk, Sakiyan shadowsuits were made with the silk of the umbraspider, which they considered to be superior. The shadowsuits refracted and absorbed light, which meant that it was nearly impossible to see the wearer without a very bright light. A shadowsuit retailed for 2,500 credits.
The Sakiyan shadowsuit first appeared in the 2015 Star Wars Roleplaying Game supplement Lords of Nal Hutta published by Fantasy Flight Games.
